languages.text: {n}Вольный Торговец отвечает не сразу.{/n} "Хоть этот ублюдок никогда не вызывал во мне приятных чувств, не признать его силу было бы ошибкой. Калькасар опасен и не глуп, а значит, охота на него обещает быть увлекательной".

{n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."
languages.original_text: {n}Вольный Торговец отвечает не сразу.{/n} "Хоть этот ублюдок никогда не вызывал во мне приятных чувств, не признать его силу было бы ошибкой. Калькасар опасен и не глуп, а значит, охота на него обещает быть увлекательной".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Rogue Trader pauses with the reply.{/n} "Although that bastard has never endeared himself to me, it would be a mistake not to recognize his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be an exciting one."

{n}The Rogue Trader pauses with the reply.{/n} "Although that bastard has never endeared himself to me, it would be a mistake not to recognize his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be an exciting one."

{n}The Rogue Trader pauses before the reply.{/n} "Although that bastard never appealed to me, it would be a mistake not to recognize his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be an exciting one."

{n}The Rogue Trader pauses before the reply.{/n} "Although that bastard never appealed to me, it would be a mistake not to recognize his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be an exciting one."

{n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."

{n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."

languages.text: {n}El Comerciante Independiente hace una pausa antes de responder.{/n} «Aunque nunca le he visto un lado bueno a ese cabrón, sería un error no reconocer su poder. Calcazar es peligroso y no tiene un pelo de tonto, así que darle caza será emocionante».
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comerciante Independiente hace una pausa antes de responder.{/n} «Aunque ese cabrón nunca me ha caído bien, sería un error no reconocer su poder. Calcazar es peligroso y no tiene un pelo de tonto, así que darle caza será interesante».

languages.text: {n}Le libre-marchand réfléchit un instant avant de répondre :{/n} « Je n'ai pas la moindre affection pour cette ordure, mais ce serait commettre une erreur que d'ignorer son pouvoir. Calcazar est dangereux et loin d'être stupide, ce qui rendra la chasse d'autant plus palpitante. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le libre-marchand réfléchit un instant avant de répondre :{/n} « Je n'ai pas la moindre affection pour cette ordure, mais ce serait commettre une erreur que d'ignorer son pouvoir. Calcazar est dangereux et loin d'être stupide, ce qui rendra la chasse d'autant plus palpitante. »

languages.text: {n}自由開拓者が返答に詰まる。{/n}「あのクソ野郎に好感を持ったことはないが、奴の力を侮るのは間違いってもんだろうな。カルカサルは危険で、馬鹿からは程遠い。つまり、奴の狩りはスリル満点なものになりそうってわけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."

traits.locale_text: {n}自由開拓者が返答に詰まる。{/n}「あのクソ野郎に好感を持ったことはないが、奴の力を侮るのは間違いってもんだろうな。カルカサルは危険で、馬鹿からは程遠い。つまり、奴の狩りはスリル満点なものになりそうってわけだ」

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯顿了顿，随后开了口。{/n}“虽然我一点都不喜欢那个混蛋，但如果因此低估他的实力，那就太愚蠢了。卡尔卡扎非常危险，而且脑子一点都不笨。这意味着，与他之间的对决，会是场激动人心的狩猎。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯顿了顿，随后开了口。{/n}“虽然我一点都不喜欢那个混蛋，但如果因此低估他的实力，那就太愚蠢了。卡尔卡扎非常危险，而且脑子一点都不笨。这意味着，与他之间的对决，会是场激动人心的狩猎。”

languages.text: {n}Der Freihändler hält kurz inne, ehe er antwortet.{/n} "Ich konnte diesen Bastard noch nie leihen, aber es wäre ein Fehler, seine Macht nicht anzuerkennen. Calcazar ist gefährlich und alles andere als dumm. Die Jagd nach ihm wird also aufregend werden."
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Freihändler hält kurz inne, ehe er antwortet.{/n} "Ich konnte diesen Bastard noch nie leihen, aber es wäre ein Fehler, seine Macht nicht anzuerkennen. Calcazar ist gefährlich und alles andere als dumm. Die Jagd nach ihm wird also aufregend werden."

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir, yanıt vermeden önce duraksıyor.{/n} "O şerefsizde hoşlanılacak hiçbir şey görmemiş olsam da gücünü küçümsemek hata olurdu. Calcazar tehlikeli ve kesinlikle bir aptal değil. Bu da demek oluyor ki onu avlamak heyecanlı olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader pauses before replying.{/n} "While I've never seen anything to like in that bastard, it would be a mistake not to recognise his power. Calcazar is dangerous and far from stupid, which means the hunt for him will be a thrilling one."
